rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;687a47ad.1503">   <title>CFP Transformative Practice and Theory: where we stand today MeCCSA PGN Conference </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;687a47ad.1503</link>   <description> Apologies for cross-posting<br><br>EXTENDED DEADLINE CFP MeCCSA PGN Conference 2015<br><br>Deadline: Monday 23rd of March 2015<br><br>Coventry University 2-3 July 2015<br><br>'Transformative Practice and Theory: where we stand today'<br><br>Pre-Conference Screening of Oscar Award Winning Documentary CitizenFour on the 1st of July<br><br>Confirmed speakers: Dr. Clare Birchall (King's College), Prof. Lisa Blackman (Goldsmiths), Dr. Rebecca Coleman (Goldsmiths), Prof. Gary Hall (Coventry University) and Associate Prof. Mandy Rose (University of West England/Digital Cultures Research Centre) [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-05T13:00:03-00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>MeCCSA PGN Conference Team</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;687a47ad.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;faeebf1f.1412">   <title>Call for Applications: International M.A. in New Media & Digital Culture \ufffd\ufffdat the University of Amsterdam</title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;faeebf1f.1412</link>   <description> International M.A. in New Media \ufffd\ufffdat the University of Amsterdam<br><br>Call for Applications for\ufffd\ufffd Fall 2015, rolling admissions open on November 17, 2014 and close on 1 April 2015<br><br>One-year and two-year New Media M.A. Programs available. For the two-year &quot;Research Master's Program: New Media Specialisation,&quot; see below.<br><br>### International M.A. in New Media &amp; Digital Culture (one-year program) ### [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-03T12:56:54+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carolin Gerlitz</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;faeebf1f.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;7560146a.1411">   <title>Midlands3Cities Application Writing Workshop </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;7560146a.1411</link>   <description> With apologies for cross-posting<br><br>List members may be interested to hear of a PhD Funding Application Writing Workshop, hosted this Saturday by the University of Birmingham and Birmingham City University.<br><br>The event is an excellent opportunity for prospective PhD students to meet academics and peers, gain an insight into life as a funded PhD student, and receive tailored advice on their application. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-26T12:11:30+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Dale Bilson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;7560146a.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;a99cf9cf.1411">   <title>2nd call: Show Me Your Dashboard - Digital Methods Winter School 2015 - Univ. of Amsterdam </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;a99cf9cf.1411</link>   <description> This is the second call for participation in the Digital Methods Winter<br>School at the University of Amsterdam, 12-16 January 2015. The deadline for<br>applications is 8 December 2014.<br><br>Together with Nathaniel Tkacz on dashboard critique (Univ Warwick) and<br>Carolin Gerlitz on social media metrics (Univ Amsterdam), new speakers have<br>confirmed from SumOfUs, UNICEF, TckTckTck, Climate Action Network and the<br>Dutch design agency Clever Franke. We are also joined by the Density Design<br>Lab, Milan. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-21T14:23:37+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Liliana Bounegru</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;a99cf9cf.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;a1901de8.1411">   <title>Neurocreator - A Universal Model for Creators? </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;a1901de8.1411</link>   <description> *apologies for cross-posting*<br><br>Hello Creators,<br><br>the inaugural journal of Neurocreator introduces a different way of looking<br>at how creators do what we do.<br><br>From the traditions of general semantics, neuro-linguistics, changework<br>therapies and the latest explorations of neuroscience comes an approach<br>that is already transforming creators' lives.<br><br>For instance, the concepts of inspiration and the muse are based on very<br>old ideas - such as the belief system of the Roman Empire and their gods!<br>Surely in the 21st Century we can get closer to the reality of the creative<br>process? [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-03T14:56:54+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Mal Williamson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;a1901de8.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;954adc74.1410">   <title>Show Me Your Dashboard - Digital Methods Winter School 2015 - Univ. of Amsterdam </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;954adc74.1410</link>   <description> SHOW ME YOUR DASHBOARD<br>New Media Monitoring and Data Analytics as Critical Practice<br>Digital Methods Winter School, Data Sprint and Mini-Conference<br><br>*12-16 January 2015 | Digital Methods Winter School *<br>*Digital Methods Initiative | http://www.digitalmethods.net/<br>&lt;http://www.digitalmethods.net/&gt;**Media Studies | University of Amsterdam*<br>*https://wiki.digitalmethods.net/Dmi/WinterSchool2015*<br>&lt;https://wiki.digitalmethods.net/Dmi/WinterSchool2015&gt;<br><br>The Digital Methods Initiative (DMI), Amsterdam, is pleased to announce its<br>7th annual Winter School, on New Media Monitoring and Data Analytics as<br>Critical Practice. The format is that of a data sprint, with hands-on work<br>on media monitoring with data analytics, and a Mini-conference, where<br>PhD candidates, motivated scholars and advanced graduate students present<br>short papers [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-31T11:25:42+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Liliana Bounegru</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;954adc74.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;5f8bc7f8.1410">   <title>AV Preservathon, 13-14 November </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;5f8bc7f8.1410</link>   <description> ***please excuse cross-postings***<br><br>Join us on 13-14 November for the next Preservathon at VRT in Brussels,<br>Belgium!<br><br>Preservathons are two-day hands-on events developed around main themes and<br>challenges in audiovisual digitisation, preservation and long-term access.<br>During the first day, attendees will work together in small groups.<br>Activities include workshops, roleplaying, demonstrations, presentations,<br>writing and negotiation exercises (e.g. call for tender, SLA). The second<br>day is organised as a mini-conference including concise presentations and<br>demonstrations of the results and experiences from the first day, and<br>informative reviews on the subject, including the state of relevant<br>technology, related research, and open questions. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-21T15:42:56+02:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Anna van der Meulen</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;5f8bc7f8.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;d3742c08.1410">   <title>Conformity, Process and Deviation: Digital Arts as \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdOutsider\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd - London, 18 October 2014</title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;d3742c08.1410</link>   <description> *With apologies for cross-posting*<br>Some of you may find this conference of interest.<br><br>CHArt'14 | 28th Conference of Computers and the History of Art<br>Part of the King’s College London UNDERGROUND Arts &amp; Humanities Festival&lt;http://www.kcl.ac.uk/artshums/ahfest/index.aspx&gt;<br>Saturday, 18 October 2014<br><br>Programme and booking info http://tinyurl.com/CHArt-2014<br>Keynote: Douglas Dodds, V&amp;A, London, UK<br>Abstracts http://www.chart.ac.uk/chart2014/abstracts/index.html<br><br>CHArt | Computers and the History of Art (www.chart.ac.uk) was established in 1985. CHArt’s mission is to examine and raise awareness of innovative digital techniques that support the study, administration, curation and display of all forms of art and design. CHArt acts as an independent forum for new [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-06T19:15:14+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bentkowska-Kafel, Anna</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;d3742c08.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;cd914ef6.1410">   <title>Pre-Call for Applications: European Excellence Master in MEDIA ARTS CULTURES </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;cd914ef6.1410</link>   <description> Dear List members,<br>Please share.   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-03T10:13:30+02:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Image Science</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;cd914ef6.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;a76a61fa.1407">   <title>Out now: Super thick summer edition of AV Insider </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;a76a61fa.1407</link>   <description> The latest edition of AV Insider is out! This special 44 pages summer<br>edition is all about the new challenges for the audiovisual archivist:<br><br>- New support roles for the AV community<br>- Where can you find old manuals?<br>- How do you increase your digital maturity level?<br>- What we learn from other practitioner communities<br>- How inventions become an AV preservation product<br>- What are Preservathons?<br>- What to do with analogue carriers after digitisation? [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-25T14:37:46+02:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>PrestoCentre Team</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;a76a61fa.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;7bffae7.1406">   <title>One week left to register: Preservathon on AV Storage Solutions </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;7bffae7.1406</link>   <description> Dear colleagues,<br><br>We invite you to join the PrestoCentre Preservathon on AV Preservation<br>Storage Solutions. A two-day event with practical advice on the assessment<br>of long-term audiovisual storage solutions as well as an overview of new<br>developments and storage trends. The Preservathon takes place on 25-26 June<br>in Turin, Italy. Registration is open for another week, so make sure you<br>have a seat and register here:<br>www.prestocentre.org/events/preservathon/storage-2014. PrestoCentre Members<br>receive a 10% discount. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-13T15:01:40+02:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>PrestoCentre Team</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;7bffae7.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;3ce1f88.1406">   <title>The 12hr ISBN_JPEG Project <since1994!> </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;3ce1f88.1406</link>   <description> _ |__ __| | /_ |__ \\| |<br>| __| | | | (_) | | __/ (__| |_<br>__ | | | | | | __/ | |/ /_| | | | |<br>_ | | | '_ \\ / _ \\ | | / /| '_ \\| '__|<br><br>The 12hr-ISBN-JPEG Project &gt;&gt;&gt;&gt; posted since 1994 &lt;&lt;&lt;&lt; [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-05T18:25:02-07:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>{ brad brace }</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;3ce1f88.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;c4da5766.1406">   <title>Workshop on AV Preservation Storage Solutions 25 - 26 June </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;c4da5766.1406</link>   <description> PrestoCentre is organising a hands-on workshop where teams will learn what<br>is involved in selecting the best long-term audiovisual storage solution. A<br>two-day event with practical advice on the assessment of long-term<br>audiovisual storage solutions as well as an overview of new developments<br>and storage trends. This Preservathon will take place in Turin (Italy) on<br>25 - 26 June 2014. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-05T12:04:56+02:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>PrestoCentre Team</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;c4da5766.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;4e9742d7.1405">   <title>research on privacy browser extensions </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;4e9742d7.1405</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>My name is Valentine. I am a Master student at the University of Amsterdam, in New Media and Digital Culture.<br>I am currently writing my thesis about privacy browser extensions and I am entering the empirical phase of my research.<br>More precisely, I am trying to empirically investigate into users' perception and usage of anti -tracking devices and ad blockers by conducting surveys with Ghostery and AdBlock Plus users (the two selected case studies)....<br>... which appears to be more than challenging. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-08T16:31:28+02:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>valentine weydert</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;4e9742d7.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;34674a9f.1404">   <title>URGENT: Issue affecting Yahoo email subscribers to CAS and DASH </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;34674a9f.1404</link>   <description> Any subscribers to the CAS or DASH lists that use a YAHOO address should read the following advisory from Lisa Vincent, Operations Manager at JiscMail - the lists host. Subscribers that use other mail services can ignore this post.<br><br>You will not be able to post messages to the list from your YAHOO address in future. YAHOO subscribers should consider re-subscribing from a different email service. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-11T19:25:13+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Paul Brown</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;34674a9f.1404</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;c5abf994.1404">   <title>Conf: All About Imaging: Transactions 22-23 May 2014, London </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;c5abf994.1404</link>   <description> All About Imaging: Transactions 22-23 May 2014<br>University of Westminster, Harrow Campus, London, HA1 3TP<br>Co-Chairs: Sophie Triantaphillidou, Heather Barnett<br><br>Transactions is an interdisciplinary symposium exploring new directions<br>in contemporary imaging from the perspectives of art, science and<br>technology. The symposium will bring together academics, artists,<br>students and professionals working in contemporary imaging, to create<br>opportunities for knowledge exchange, demonstration and discussion.<br>Transactions aims to traverse discursive boundaries between disciplines,<br>to build shared vocabularies, mutual understanding and new synergies. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-10T20:45:29+02:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Oliver Grau</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DASH;c5abf994.1404</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
